examples.example: 我期待着明年能够实现自己的梦想，开启一段全新的旅程。

translate.english: I am looking forward to realizing my dream next year and starting a brand new journey.

examples.example: 我相信明年会有更多的美好等待着我们去发现和体验。

translate.english: I believe that there will be more beauties waiting for us to discover and experience next year.

examples.example: 我计划在明年去许多不同的地方旅行，领略各地的风土人情。

translate.english: I plan to travel to many different places next year to appreciate the local customs and practices.
